data.title: Top 28 Reggae Wedding Bands & DJs in Opelika, AL
meta_keywords: wedding bands & djs near opelika al
data.meta_description: Find your perfect reggae wedding musicians in Opelika, AL at Zola. We'll help you narrow down your musician search in minutes.
data.text:
We’re live music experts, wedding enthusiasts, and party starters, infusing every event with energy and full dance floors. We’re here to make your wedding the greatest party of your life! The Emerald Empire Band are a premium, customizable 3 to 14 piece band specializing in high-energy music–at a sensible price. Reach out to get started! Visit our website for upcoming showcase dates where you can see the band perform LIVE before booking. You can also tailor the dream band to suit your style and budget. We also offer Photo & Video services!

We will make your reception fun for all of your wedding guests! We have provided top level DJ-MC services for over 25 years in budget friendly packages. We also offer spectacular wedding photography and HD Video. Visit our site and see over 1 million photos, thousands of reviews, and some great package ideas. If you give us a call before you book any of these vendors you'll quickly learn why over 15,000 couples have chosen us to help make their special day magical. All packages include expert planning assistance, which will take away a lot of the stress associated with planning your wedding! We are available nationwide including your area!

Your wedding is about YOU! At Party Time Productions, we strive to exceed our clients' expectations. PTP has been serving the Southeast for over 20 years and is honored to have been part of over 2,000 weddings. Your wedding deserves more than a DJ - You need a professional entertainer!

"Island Sound" is named for the Owner, Justin Henshaw's hometown of Saint Simons Island, GA. Since starting the company in 2008, it has grown to offer services in over 13 states in the US. With an incredible team of DJs trained in-house, and a full time office staff, endearingly referred to as "office fam", Island Sound is ready to serve you from initial wedding planning to celebrating the big day!

Meet (Kim) Jerome Underwood, the owner and founder of Underwood's Entertainment Services. Having a true passion for music, Jerome started DJing at a very young age, and quickly became the go-to person, amongst his family and friends, for all of their party needs. Even though he can professionally elevate any type of event there is, Jerome specializes in Old School/Blues parties and Weddings.

PowerSoundsUSA is a Premier network of professional entertainment and event service professionals. We feature professional DJs, live bands, and solo artists from around the world. Whether you’re hosting a small party, a wedding with several hundred guests, or a company event entertaining thousands, our network of experienced talent is insanely awesome with pro gear that reliably and consistently delivers! And with online 24/7 communications and event tracking through our online event management system, you’ll always be well-connected and well-informed.

Diamond Entertainment can offer a variety of services that will elevate your wedding. Whatever your music tastes, they will get the party going with all your favorites. They can offer not only star-quality DJ services but also violin services. On top of this, the team can offer lighting, sound/PA systems for your ceremony, cocktail hour, and reception

Create an unforgettable experience for your family and friends by hiring Cello Joe to play at your wedding! Take the stress out of planning and trust the music to a pro. From welcoming music before the ceremony, to the ceremony, cocktail hour, dinner and dancing, Cello Joe can handle it all for you. From classical cello to alternative, funky, beatbox cello grooves to DJing a dance party, Cello Joe can perform for ceremonies, cocktail hours, and dance parties.

"Choose a job you love and you'll never have to work a day in your life." These are words I live by. Music has always been my passion since my childhood. It is one of the only things that connects us all. I take pride in providing the best soundtrack for the special day of all my clients.

Born to DJ, LLC, based in North Carolina, offers premier DJ services and specializes in weddings and other private events. Our DJ fills your special day with sounds that create and bring back life-long memories. Our DJ service takes an ordinary event and makes it special. We provide you with a DJ/MC that keeps the momentum going with customized music and an engaging personality. We specialize in several genres, including but not limited to Pop, Hip-Hop/Rap, Country, Top 40, Big Band, Rock, Latin, Motown, Gospel, EDM, Beach Music, and R&B. We have music for all ages ranging from the 1940s to today’s current hits.

DeTayls entertainment has been providing professional DJ services in the Greater Atlanta Area for over 12 years. We specialize in Weddings, Corporate, School and Private events. What makes our services unique is our attention to details. We don't mind going the extra mile to ensure that every event is a success. Great song selections coupled with superb DJ skills, allow us to provide the perfect soundtrack for your event. We have been blessed to serve hundreds of wedding clients throughout the East Coast and the Southern states.

Hey there! I am DJ Triplicate, you can call me Trey. I have been in the music industry for two decades, and ten of that has been spent in the wedding and private event space. Music is my life, and bringing music to others is my job! I am fully aware just how stressful planning a wedding can be. I am here to ensure you that with me on your side, music and atmosphere is one thing you will never have to worry about. As your DJ I will provide professional service, rock solid tech and equipment, and earth shaking sound! But wait! Theeeres mooore! I also offer licensed ministering/officiating as well as 360 photobooth!

Welcome to Manor Productions, where we specialize in creating unforgettable entertainment experiences. Specializing in weddings and events, we are passionate about delivering exceptional music and ambiance. Our talented DJs curate personalized playlists, ensuring the perfect soundtrack for your special day. With top-notch equipment and a knack for reading the crowd, we keep the dance floor buzzing. We pride ourselves on professionalism, attention to detail, and customer satisfaction. From the initial consultation to flawless execution, Manor Productions goes above and beyond to make your event stress-free and memorable.

Since 2008, I have set out to help my clients and their guests get their party on! Since the start, I have applied my experience from a decade of working in radio and my degree in Communications to making events the best-run and most fun I possibly can. I want you to enjoy your time with guests, and I want what I do to add to that enjoyment. I love working with people to create experiences that are truly reflections of themselves, their guests, and their events. I am available for weddings, parties, fundraisers, class reunions, corporate events, and more. Let's discuss your next event and get moving on getting you and your guests moving!

Our signature Dueling Pianos show is guaranteed to entertain and leave your guests talking about how fun your wedding was for long time to come! Our talented entertainers take pride in personalizing each performance with exuding energy and charisma. Having performed all over the world, on cruise ships, resorts, theme parks, sporting events, etc., our large range of musical expertise will please any audience from 8 to 80.

DJ EZZ provides professional services with state of the art equipment. We will provide nothing but clean and quality music for your event. Explicit music only upon the request of the client. DJ EZZ has years of experience doing weddings, birthday parties, corporate events, reunions and more! We take pride in our customer service. We are all about making your event one to remember. We just love to see people having a great time and enjoying themselves!

High-Energy, Top-Class Live Party Band For hire for parties, corporate functions, city celebrations, weddings, & more. The Salamanders is one of the top live party bands in the world! With two of the most talented lead singers in the industry backed by nationally-acclaimed musicians, The Salamanders have a flawless sound and radiant energy that will keep your guests dancing all night long. From ceremony music to cocktail hour entertainment, first dance through the reception & dance party, The Salamanders are the live wedding music band of choice for venues and planners across the United States! Ask about our horn section for additional beauty

My name is Paul, I am a computer engineer, audio and video specialist with many years of experience of event set up and support. I truly love what I do and aim for the best services to provide. I master classical performance and never stop learning and implement innovative technologies.

A soulful take on the songs you love, from classics of the 1960's all the way to today's top 40 hits. Allow me to curate your music for an unforgettable show at your next event! 🎼 PLEASE READ BEFORE CONTACTING ME 👉my minimum fee is $600 for a solo performance. I'd love to create a custom quote for your special event. Thank you! ❤️🤘 I've played solo, with a full band, or anywhere in between and have been performing for over a decade. My repertoire spans from 1960s through the present, ranging from Adele to Otis Redding. (Ask for my song list!)

AMP’D ENTERTAINMENT is Atlanta’s most creative DJ company. We are a company run by music lovers for music lovers. We specialize in unparalleled personal attention and fully customized musical experiences. Forget the boring cookie cutter playlists you’ve heard from the other guys. We focus on the music that is uniquely personal to our clients and also reinventing the classics with the skills of “real DJs.” We’re talking live mashups and remixes, sampling, scratching, and quick mixing so you get to hear more songs. We know you’ll spot the difference right away. Get in touch and find out how AMP’D ENTERTAINMENT can remix YOUR next event!

Multiple award winners and world travelers, The Groove Merchants is one of the top party and dance bands in the United States. Our high energy and great song flow keep people on the dance floor and keeps clients calling us back time and time again.

Elevated Entertainment is a locally-owned and operated event entertainment business in Birmingham, Alabama that specializes in DJ & emcee services, photo booth rentals, karaoke, and party & wedding entertainment. Andrew and Emily started this business from scratch in 2016, and have been going strong ever since! Elevated Entertainment has grown from Montevallo to serve the areas of Birmingham, Huntsville, Montgomery, Tuscaloosa and Gadsden, Alabama. Once the word got out Elevated Entertainment, the customer reviews began rolling in, and have been overwhelmingly positive.

I love playing for weddings, and working with couples to customize the soundtrack for their ceremony! I have played for over 800 weddings, for guest lists from 3 to 2000, and across four continents. Specializing in music you don't expect to hear on the harp, couples can choose jazz, popular, Bollywood, Arabic, Broadway, and classical music for their weddings.

P.A.P.A. Entertainment is a professional DJ company based in Birmingham, Tuscaloosa, and Huntsville, Alabama. It specializes in wedding and event DJ services tailored to meet couples' expectation. The company's team has the knowledge and experience to help couples create a package that suits their needs. P.A.P.A. Entertainment offers hassle-free and premium services.

Richmond Punch is a violin virtuoso who delivers a riveting, dynamic, explosive, and powerful performance! A native of Dallas, Texas, Richmond graduated from the top-rated Arts Magnet Booker T. Washington High School for the Performing and Visual Arts. He honed his craft and earned a Bachelor’s Degree from the famous Juilliard School of Music in New York and received a Master’s Degree from the prestigious Yale University. He specializes in live violin music for all types of special events including corporate, concerts, festivals, weddings and worship.
